# Antlr4_LcypherParser_INPUT - the ANTLR input used for the macro
# Antlr4_LcypherParser_OUTPUTS - the outputs generated by ANTLR
# Antlr4_LcypherParser_CXX_OUTPUTS - the C++ outputs generated by ANTLR
# Antlr4_LcypherParser_OUTPUT_DIR - the output directory for ANTLR
antlr4_target(SpiderParser SpiderSql.g4
    PARSER LEXER VISITOR
    PACKAGE parser
    OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/parser)

add_library(parser ${Antlr4_SpiderParser_CXX_OUTPUTS})
target_compile_features(parser PUBLIC cxx_std_17)
target_include_directories(parser PUBLIC ${Antlr4_SpiderParser_OUTPUT_DIR})
target_link_libraries(parser PUBLIC Antlr4::runtime)
